TextLibrary.Text: Time Warp effects (miss a turn) are removed before your turn starts
Your Green Energy loses 3 points each turn
Your Shield loses 4 points each turn
Your Shield regenerates 4 points at the start of each turn
You have 25% chance of an extra turn
Your Red Energy loses 3 points each turn
Has a 20% chance to reduce incoming damage to 1 point
All incoming damage is diverted until you damage your enemy
Adds +1 to Red, Yellow, and Green Energy when taking damage
Shields leak through the first 5 points of damage
All damage is halved if your Shield Energy is greater than 0
All incoming damage of 3+ is reduced by 5 points
Adds +1 damage for every 2 Yellow Gems in play
Non-damage matches will reinforce your Shields but award -1 less of that Gem type
Matching Red, Green, or Blue Gems gives you +2 Yellow Energy
Gems fall in a rotating pattern
Gems fall in the opposite direction to your last move
Any Nova fills up all your Energy bars
All Energy matches made double in effect
All damage matches made double in effect
When Green Energy is 15+, damage is increased
Gives 2 Green Energy and 10% of shields each turn (min: 3)
You take 10 hull damage when you cause novae, and 20 more for supernovae
Auto-Repair deals damage instead of hull repair (10% chance of discovery)
Both ships' auto-repair is set to zero
Gunnery has been reduced by up to 90%. 10% Recovers each turn.
Engines have been compromised. -65% Engineer and 20% Chance of high-fuel leak
Damage increased by 3~10 based on ship size. Cancels with hull damage
Damage increased by 5~12 based on ship size. Cancels with hull damage
Ship has a ~40% chance to deal 150% damage.
Reduces incoming damage by 75%, ~30% of the time
Alters the engine gained according to ship size
Prevents all damage. Exhausts shields when it expires.
Causes 2 Hull and Shield damage when matching Purple Gems.
Deals 3 Hull and Shield damage each turn.
Deals 1 Hp/Sp damage each turn and lowers stats by 20%.
